Block.question: Hey there, how big is the yard in this house? Is it big enough for playing tag or flying kites? I hope there's plenty of space for me and my friends to run around and have fun!
Block.label: Input lot size (meters)...

Block.question: Hey there, how big is the actual size of the home? Is it possible to play hide in seek in it?
Block.label: Input house lot size (meters)...
